name: 奇幻东征
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/780670/extras/Intro.gif?t=1689600492[/img]
《奇幻东征》是一款Roguelike的冒险动作游戏，玩家扮演受天神诏示而踏上征途的领导者。
在随机的地图与路线上做出抉择、招兵买马、搜集宝物、通过各种战斗和奇遇来完成使命！

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/780670/extras/Banner114m2f.gif?t=1689600492[/img]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/780670/extras/Gameplay.gif?t=1689600492[/img]
安排你的阵容！你的追随者有不同的技能与阵线，随心所欲玩出自己的战术！
不擅长微操？没关系，每个单位都会有各自强力的AI操控！
你要做的是专心的选择，选择路线、选择追随者、升级技能、选择道具、选择阵线排列！
挑战完美的击溃敌人、发展各有千秋的战斗型态！

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/780670/extras/ArrangeTitlef.gif?t=1689600492[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/780670/extras/FightTitle2f.gif?t=1689600492[/img]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/780670/extras/Features.gif?t=1689600492[/img]
[list][li]大量单位的即时战斗，思考合理配置、组出达成战术的最佳阵容！
[/li][li]排列不同的阵线的追随者，可以获得不同的特性加成！
[/li][li]追随者在过程中可获得各种成长，成为独一无二的单位！
[/li][li]随机的世界与遭遇，每次游戏都是新的旅程！
[/li][li]数十种追随者、技能、道具以及魔物，实现你的战术灵感！[/li][/list]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/780670/extras/Items.png?t=1689600492[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/780670/extras/LaserTitlef.gif?t=1689600492[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/780670/extras/MonkTitlef.gif?t=1689600492[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/780670/extras/Together3f.gif?t=1689600492[/img]

奇幻东征官方玩家群：1063712566
